sentences.en: A teacher should be good at drawing inferences about other cases from one instance.
sentences.cn: 老师要善于举一反三.

sentences.en: Ethiopia, for instance uses the equivalent of just twenty kilos of oil per head a year.
sentences.cn: 比如说，埃塞俄比亚每年的人均消费支出仅相当于20公斤的石油。

sentences.en: For instance, a base metal could perhaps be turned into gold.
sentences.cn: 例如, 也许可以使一种廉价金属变成黄金.

sentences.en: I came here at the instance of Dr. Jekyll.
sentences.cn: 我是应吉基尔博士的邀请来这儿的.

sentences.en: In the first instance your child will be seen by an ear, nose and throat specialist.
sentences.cn: 你的孩子将首先由耳鼻喉专科医生来诊察。

sentences.en: In this instance I think she was mistaken.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上我认为她弄错了。

sentences.en: It is not a unique instance , but has its counterpart.
sentences.cn: 无独有偶.

sentences.en: Let your child make some of the small decisions concerning his daily routine. For instance, allow him to choose what clothes he wears at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 让孩子在日常生活中作一些小决定。比如，让他自己决定周末穿什么衣服。

sentences.en: Like last night, for instance, I thought ghosts were really scary.
sentences.cn: 譬如昨天晚上, 我觉得鬼真可怕.

sentences.en: Mr Robins, suffering from selective amnesia about his role in the affair, was contradicted in nearly every instance by other witnesses.
sentences.cn: 对于自己在该事件中所扮演的角色，罗宾斯先生患上了选择性失忆症，因此几乎在每次庭审中都会受到其他证人的反驳。

sentences.en: prosecution at the instance of the police.
sentences.cn: 应警方要求进行的起诉。

sentences.en: Teenage sex, for instance, may come not out of genuine desire but from a need to get love.
sentences.cn: 例如，青少年的性行为可能并不是源于真正的情欲，而是出于一种对爱的需要。

sentences.en: the appointment will be for three years in the first instance.
sentences.cn: 首先，任期为期三年。

sentences.en: The post was for one year in the first instance with possible renewal to a further year.
sentences.cn: 该岗位初始为一年期，有可能会再续聘一年。

sentences.en: There are a number of improvements; for instance, both mouse buttons can now be used.
sentences.cn: 在许多地方有了改进，例如，鼠标的左右键都可以使用了。

sentences.en: There are jobs more dangerous than truck driving; for instance, training lions.
sentences.cn: 有的工作比驾驶卡车更危险, 例如驯狮.

sentences.en: They came across many instances of discrimination.
sentences.cn: 他们遇到很多歧视的事例。

sentences.en: They will be concerned to do the right thing — to dress properly, for instance.
sentences.cn: 他们需要注意行为是否恰当——比如说，穿着得体。

sentences.en: This was the instance that occured first to my mind.
sentences.cn: 首先在我脑中闪现的就是这个例子.

sentences.en: We need to rethink the way we consume energy. Take, for instance, our approach to transport.
sentences.cn: 我们需要重新考虑我们使用能源的方式，例如我们的运输方式。

phrases.tran_cn: (律)初审时。 参见 court of first instance
(正式)应…的要求，经…的请求；在…的鼓动下

phrases.phrase: in the first (或second 等) instance
phrases.tran_cn: 首先（或其次等）；第一步（或第二步等）
（类的）实例；（某类别的） 实体

trans.tran_cn: 例子，实例，情况，要求，建议，[法]诉讼手续

trans.tran_en: to give something as an example
